attributes.action: Stop giving visas to corrupt people from any country
attributes.background: Nawaz sharif,Ishaq Dar,sharjeel Memon,Altaf Hussain Pervez Musharraf are few corrupt people bought properties from stolen money,also invoved in money laundring and killings..

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly how you'd like the rules on UK visas to be changed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
